I'm Taylor.

I'm from Kansas. I live in Los Angeles.

I live a double life.

Work

I'm an SEO Specialist for Tribune Publishing. I manage SEO (Search Engine Optimization) for publications, including the L.A. Times and Chicago Tribune.

Not Work

I'm a comedy person. I've studied at The Second City, iO, The Annoyance and UCB. I make short comedy videos for the internet. Watch them, won't you?
